Important compatibility fixes
Important compatibility fixes
Important compatibility fixes
Important compatibility fixes

We are pleased to announce the launch of new features in the Citi Mobile® App.

• View and download your e-Statement
• Keep track of your card benefits and reward points/cash rebate balance
• Convert your big purchases or monthly statements into your preferred monthly installment plans
• View and search for any transaction made in the past few months
• Customers with credit cards only will see a new login screen and pair up the device with their own account after logging on for the first time. There’s no need to input the user ID for every login.

We are always working to improve the mobile banking experience further, with more updates in the pipeline

We are pleased to announce the launch of new features in the Citi Mobile® App.

• View and download your e-Statement
• Keep track of your card benefits and reward points/cash rebate balance
• Convert your big purchases or monthly statements into your preferred monthly installment plans
• View and search for any transaction made in the past few months
• Customers with credit cards only will see a new login screen and pair up the device with their own account after logging on for the first time. There’s no need to input the user ID for every login.

We are always working to improve the mobile banking experience further, with more updates in the pipeline
Important compatibility fixes
Important compatibility fixes

Got bank accounts?
• Experience a new user interface and a new way of managing your bank accounts. Some features will remain unchanged for now, but we're working very hard on extending the new experience to those as well.
• Log in with your password, fingerprint, or through facial recognition. The app is now safely and invisibly locked to your username.

Got bank accounts?
• Experience a new user interface and a new way of managing your bank accounts. Some features will remain unchanged for now, but we're working very hard on extending the new experience to those as well.
• Log in with your password, fingerprint, or through facial recognition. The app is now safely and invisibly locked to your username.

A simpler, faster and safe way of banking is here.
• Access your bank and card details at your fingertips.
• Never miss a statement.
• Pay later with ease - Quickly view and convert your credit card purchases or statement balances into monthly instalments under our instalment loan program.
• Get More - Discover a curated selection of Citi products and services relevant to your needs.
• View your card rewards points and latest deals.

Do more with just one app. A simpler, faster and safe way of banking is here.
• In-app survey 2.0 - Quickly rate and share your experience for us to make our application better.
• Next best offer/Getmore - Discover a curated selection of Citi products and services relevant to your needs.
• “Forgot password” enhancement – If you got inactive or locked, use “Forgot password” to re-login!

Do more with just one app. A simpler, faster and safe way of banking is here.
• In-app survey 2.0 - Quickly rate and share your experience for us to make our application better.
• Next best offer/Getmore - Discover a curated selection of Citi products and services relevant to your needs.
• “Forgot password” enhancement – If you got inactive or locked, use “Forgot password” to re-login!

Do more with just one app. A simpler, faster and safe way of banking is here.
• Digital card activation – you can activate your credit card digitally to view and use the full card number, expiry date and a Temporary CVV for your online payments while it is in transit.
• eMGM – Refer your friends and family to Citigold and enjoy exclusive rewards for both of you.
• “Forgot password” enhancement – If you got inactive or locked, use “Forgot password” to re-login!

Do more with just one app. A simpler, faster and safe way of banking is here.
• Digital card activation – you can activate your credit card digitally to view and use the full card number, expiry date and a Temporary CVV for your online payments while it is in transit.
• eMGM – Refer your friends and family to Citigold and enjoy exclusive rewards for both of you.
• “Forgot password” enhancement – If you got inactive or locked, use “Forgot password” to re-login!

Do more with just one app. A simpler, faster and safe way of banking is here.

• Cash Rebate – cash back redemption using your Points is now available on Citi mobile app
• Pay with Point – pay for your purchases with cash back points easily, flexibly and hassle free on Citi Mobile app
• Citi Personal loan – instantly booking Citi Personal Loan with hassle-free process, no document required, loan disbursement within 24 hours
